++ Elements
There's a number of elements which apply debuffs (or buffs). Elements can also be found in-world in the form of Surfaces or liquids. Surfaces are that element when applied to a tile, and they spread it to things standing on it.

+Oil:
Slows enemies + players, spreads Fire and explodes
+Fire:
Does dot to enemies + players, sets fire to Oil and Slime
+Slime:
Slows players unless produced by a player, in which case it slows enemies. Spreads fire, does not explode
+Water:
Extinguishes Fire. Spreads Poison
+Poison:
Applies lingering percent-based dot unless on a boss
